description:
At Nichols Lang & Hamlin, LLC, we bring more than 50 years of experience to your case. From our Chesterfield, Missouri law office, we advocate for people throughout the St. Louis area in personal injury, workers' compensation and civil litigation issues. Our attorneys are known and respected throughout the legal community, having earned honors that include the following:

• Listed in the America's Top 100 Personal Injury Attorneys
• Selected for inclusion in The Best Lawyers in America
• Selected for inclusion in Super Lawyers
• Holding an Avvo "Superb" rating

Additionally, several attorneys at our law office - Dean Nichols, Christopher Lang and Todd Applegate - have earned the highest peer rating possible of AV Preeminent* from Martindale-Hubbell.

Having our kind of experience and advocacy on your side means being backed by a team that knows how to navigate the legal system in your favor. We have overseen complex, multimillion-dollar cases. In trials and negotiations, we remain focused on reaching your goals. When your future is on the line, you can trust us to act in your best interests.

Nichols Lang & Hamlin, LLC, offers free initial consultations. We also have the ability to meet with clients in places other than our law office, such as in their homes or the hospital. When the situation calls for it, we are able to offer virtual appointments.

* AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
